pre_001.title: Lascaux Cave Paintings
pre_001.description: Prehistoric cave paintings depicting animals, humans, and symbols. One of the earliest forms of human artistic expression.
pre_001.how_benefits: Preserves human connection to nature, community, and spiritual expression. Truth-telling through visual narrative.
pre_001.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through truth-telling, community connection, and spiritual expression. One of humanity's earliest frequential alignments.
pre_001.timeline_alignment: Prehistoric - Foundation of human artistic expression aligned with truth and community
pre_001.historical_significance: Earliest known human artistic expression, preserving connection to nature and community
pre_001.cultural_impact: Foundation of all human art and craft - truth-telling through visual narrative

anc_001.title: Great Pyramid of Giza
anc_001.description: Monumental architecture serving as tombs and spiritual structures. Masterpiece of ancient engineering and craft.
anc_001.how_benefits: Demonstrates human capacity for stewardship, precision, and spiritual connection. Community effort for collective purpose.
anc_001.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through stewardship, precision, and spiritual alignment. Community effort for collective purpose.
anc_001.timeline_alignment: Ancient - Stewardship and spiritual alignment through architecture
anc_001.historical_significance: One of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, demonstrating human capacity for stewardship and precision
anc_001.cultural_impact: Symbol of ancient Egyptian civilization, demonstrating community effort and spiritual alignment

anc_002.title: Ancient Greek Pottery
anc_002.description: Functional and decorative pottery with narrative scenes. Combines utility with artistic expression and storytelling.
anc_002.how_benefits: Combines utility with truth-telling through narrative scenes. Serves community through functional beauty and education.
anc_002.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through truth-telling, community utility, and beauty. Functional art serving community needs.
anc_002.timeline_alignment: Ancient - Truth-telling and community utility through functional art
anc_002.historical_significance: Preserves ancient Greek narratives, myths, and daily life through functional art
anc_002.cultural_impact: Foundation of Western art tradition, combining utility with truth-telling
anc_002.museum_collection: Metropolitan Museum of Art, British Museum, Louvre

cla_001.title: Roman Mosaics
cla_001.description: Intricate floor and wall mosaics using tesserae (small pieces of stone, glass, or ceramic). Combines beauty with durability.
cla_001.how_benefits: Creates beauty in community spaces. Demonstrates stewardship through durable, lasting art serving community.
cla_001.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through beauty, community spaces, and stewardship. Durable art serving community.
cla_001.timeline_alignment: Classical - Beauty and stewardship in community spaces
cla_001.historical_significance: Preserves Roman artistic expression and community values through durable mosaic art
cla_001.cultural_impact: Demonstrates Roman commitment to beauty and community through lasting art
cla_001.current_status: Preserved in archaeological sites and museums

med_001.title: Gothic Cathedrals
med_001.description: Soaring architectural masterpieces combining stone, glass, and light. Community effort for spiritual and community spaces.
med_001.how_benefits: Creates community spaces for unity, spiritual connection, and beauty. Demonstrates community effort and stewardship.
med_001.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through spiritual connection, community unity, and stewardship. Community effort for collective purpose.
med_001.timeline_alignment: Medieval - Community unity and spiritual connection through architecture
med_001.historical_significance: Masterpieces of medieval architecture, demonstrating community effort and spiritual alignment
med_001.cultural_impact: Symbols of medieval community unity and spiritual connection

med_002.title: Islamic Calligraphy
med_002.description: Sacred writing as art form. Combines spiritual truth with visual beauty. Unity through shared script and meaning.
med_002.how_benefits: Preserves spiritual truth through beautiful writing. Creates unity through shared script and meaning across cultures.
med_002.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through spiritual truth, unity, and beauty. Sacred writing as art form.
med_002.timeline_alignment: Medieval - Spiritual truth and unity through calligraphy
med_002.historical_significance: Preserves Islamic spiritual truth and creates unity through shared script
med_002.cultural_impact: Unifies diverse cultures through shared script and spiritual meaning
med_002.museum_collection: Metropolitan Museum, British Museum, Topkapi Palace

ren_001.title: Renaissance Paintings
ren_001.description: Revival of classical ideals through painting. Truth-telling through human expression, beauty, and spiritual connection.

mod_001.title: Arts and Crafts Movement
mod_001.artist_craftsperson: William Morris, John Ruskin, and Craftspeople
mod_001.description: Reaction against industrialization. Return to handcraftsmanship, truth in materials, beauty in utility. Community and stewardship.
mod_001.how_benefits: Returns to truth in materials and handcraftsmanship. Stewardship through quality, community through shared craft.
mod_001.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through truth in materials, stewardship, and community. Reaction against separation through industrialization.
mod_001.timeline_alignment: Industrial - Truth and stewardship through handcraftsmanship
mod_001.historical_significance: Reaction against industrialization, return to truth and stewardship
mod_001.cultural_impact: Influenced modern design, emphasizing truth, stewardship, and community
mod_001.museum_collection: Victoria and Albert Museum, Metropolitan Museum, etc.
mod_001.current_status: Preserved in museums and continues to influence craft
mod_001.source: Deep search - Arts and Crafts Movement

con_001.title: Community Art Projects
